text: The Headless Horseman () is a 1972 Soviet adventure movie directed by Vladimir Vaynshtok.Синематека по-московски. Какие фильмы и где можно посмотреть в декабреВСАДНИК БЕЗ ГОЛОВЫ (1973) It stars Oleg Vidov, Ludmila Savelyeva, and Eslinda Núñez. ==Actors== *Oleg Vidov as Maurice Gerald (voiced by Eduard Izotov) *Ludmila Savelyeva as Louise Poindexter *Eslinda Núñez as Isidora Cavarubio *Enriques Santiesteban as El Coyote (voiced by Aleksandr Belyavsky) *Alejandro Lugo as Woodley Poindexter (voiced by Felix Yavorsky) *Aarne Üksküla as Cassius Calhoun (voiced by Aleksey Konsovsky) *Ivan Ivanovich Petrov as Zeb Stump == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1972 adventure movies Category:Russian adventure movies Category:Soviet adventure movies Category:Cuban movies Category:Movies set in the 19th century Category:Movies set in Texas Category:Movies directed by Vladimir Vaynshtok
title: The Headless Horseman (1972 movie)
